SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.opencl

Class ARMProtectedMemoryAllocation

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.opencl.ARMProtectedMemoryAllocation
public final class ARMProtectedMemoryAllocation extends Object
Native bindings to the arm_protected_memory_allocation extension.

This extensions enables the creation of buffers and images backed by protected memory, i.e. memory protected using TrustZone Media Protection.

Requires CL12.

  • Field Details

    • CL_MEM_PROTECTED_ALLOC_ARM

      public static final int CL_MEM_PROTECTED_ALLOC_ARM
      New flag added to cl_mem_flags.

      Specifies that the memory object being created will be backed by protected memory. When this flag is present, the only host flag allowed is MEM_HOST_NO_ACCESS. If host flags are omitted, CL_MEM_HOST_NO_ACCESS is assumed.

      See Also:
